display_name: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale: Sum of 20 items.
description:
Total score from the CESD Questionnaire, a high score suggests more severe symptoms. [Radloff, L. S. (1977)](https://doi.org/10.1177/014662167700100306)

[Search for all CESD Questionnaire variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/answers/variables?search=cesd)
calculation: cesd_1 + cesd_2 + cesd_3 + cesd_4 + cesd_5 + cesd_6 + cesd_7 + cesd_8 + cesd_9 + cesd_10 + cesd_11 + cesd_12 + cesd_13 + cesd_14 + cesd_15 + cesd_16 + cesd_17 + cesd_18 + cesd_20
